FontString.name: $parentTopText
FontString.text: Item Name Long Long Long Long Long

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT", 28, -8) GameTooltip:AddLine('Item is on player\'s Wishlist', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

FontString.name: $parentName
FontString.text: [longest item name ever ever ever ever ever ever]

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT", 0, 0) GameTooltip:AddLine('TALC', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine('Left-click to toggle frame') GameTooltip:AddLine('Right-click for options') GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if arg1 == "LeftButton" then TalcFrame:ToggleMainWindow() else TalcFrame:ShowMinimapDropdown() end

FontString.name: $parentLCStatus
FontString.text: You are not part of Loot Council

FontString.name: $parentDescription
FontString.text: You can define some items, LC will see them. Your current Wishlist is empty.
